shared.facades

Class RobberFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.facades.AbstractFacade
      • shared.facades.RobberFacade

  • public class RobberFacade
extends AbstractFacade
    RobberFacade is a facade for the robber. It checks if players have 8 or more resource cards. It also checks where the robber is being moved and who the player can steal from.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RobberFacade(ClientModel model)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void callRobberMethodsByAKnightCard()
      This method is activated by playing a Soldier Development card and calls the moveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation) and stealFrom(Player, Player), in left-to-right order Note: The discardHalf(Player) will not be called with this method
      void callRobberMethodsByRollingA7()
      This method is activated by rolling a 7 and calls the discardHalf(Player), moveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation), and stealFrom(Player, Player), in left-to-right order Note: discardHalf(Player) will be called for each individual Player in the ClientModel
      boolean canMoveRobber(HexLocation newLocation, HexLocation currentLocation)
      Checks to see if the new HexLocation is valid for the robber.
      boolean canStealFrom(Player currentPlayer, Player targetPlayer)
      Checks if the currentPlayer can steal a resource card from targetPlayer
      void discardHalf(Player player)
      The specified Player discards half of their resource cards, rounded down.
      void moveRobber(HexLocation newLocation, HexLocation currentLocation)
      Moves the robber to the newLocation.
      boolean shouldDiscardHalf(Player player)
      If a Player has 8 or more resource cards, they must discard half, rounded down.
      void stealFrom(Player currentPlayer, Player targetPlayer)
      The currentPlayer steals one random resource card from targetPlayer

        getModel, setModel

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • RobberFacade

        RobberFacade(@NotNull
             ClientModel model)
        Constructor. Requires a valid game model to work.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to use, not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if model is null
        Precondition:
        model is a valid ClientModel.
        Postcondition:
        This provides valid operations on model.

    • Method Detail

      • callRobberMethodsByRollingA7

        public void callRobberMethodsByRollingA7()
        This method is activated by rolling a 7 and calls the discardHalf(Player), moveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation), and stealFrom(Player, Player), in left-to-right order Note: discardHalf(Player) will be called for each individual Player in the ClientModel
        Precondition:
        The robber is activated by rolling a 7.
        Postcondition:
        All described robber actions are executed correctly.

      • callRobberMethodsByAKnightCard

        public void callRobberMethodsByAKnightCard()
        This method is activated by playing a Soldier Development card and calls the moveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation) and stealFrom(Player, Player), in left-to-right order Note: The discardHalf(Player) will not be called with this method
        Precondition:
        The robber is activated by a Player playing a Soldier Development card (a result of activating DevCardFacade.useSoldierCard(Player))
        Postcondition:
        All described robber actions are executed correctly.

      • shouldDiscardHalf

        public boolean shouldDiscardHalf(Player player)
        If a Player has 8 or more resource cards, they must discard half, rounded down.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player part of the current ClientModel.
        Returns:
        True if the Player has 8 or more resource cards, False if 7 or less.
        Precondition:
        The player must be part of the current ClientModel. This method must have been called by discardHalf(Player).
        Postcondition:
        None

      • discardHalf

        public void discardHalf(Player player)
        The specified Player discards half of their resource cards, rounded down.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player part of the current ClientModel.
        Precondition:
        This method is called by callRobberMethodsByRollingA7(). The player must be part of the current ClientModel. shouldDiscardHalf(Player) returned a true statement.
        Postcondition:
        The Player must have half of their cards.

      • canMoveRobber

        public boolean canMoveRobber(HexLocation newLocation,
                             HexLocation currentLocation)
        Checks to see if the new HexLocation is valid for the robber.
        Parameters:
        newLocation - A HexLocation that is the new place for the robber.
        currentLocation - A HexLocation that is the current location for the robber.
        Returns:
        True if newLocation is valid, False if not
        Precondition:
        newLocation and currentLocation are not null and are valid HexLocation. This method is called by moveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation).
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • moveRobber

        public void moveRobber(HexLocation newLocation,
                       HexLocation currentLocation)
        Moves the robber to the newLocation.
        Parameters:
        newLocation - A HexLocation that is the new place for the robber.
        currentLocation - A HexLocation that is the current location for the robber.
        Precondition:
        callRobberMethodsByRollingA7() calls this method after every discardHalf(Player) method is called or this method is called by callRobberMethodsByAKnightCard() canMoveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation) returns a true statement.
        Postcondition:
        The robber is moved to the newLocation.

      • canStealFrom

        public boolean canStealFrom(Player currentPlayer,
                            Player targetPlayer)
        Checks if the currentPlayer can steal a resource card from targetPlayer
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is moving the robber (who's turn it currently is in this game)
        targetPlayer - The player that the current player wants to take a resource card from
        Returns:
        True if the currentPlayer can steal from the targetPlayer, False if not
        Precondition:
        This method is called by stealFrom(Player, Player). currentPlayer and targetPlayer are both valid (not null) and are both part of the current ClientModel.
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • stealFrom

        public void stealFrom(Player currentPlayer,
                      Player targetPlayer)
        The currentPlayer steals one random resource card from targetPlayer
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is moving the robber (who's turn it currently is in this game)
        targetPlayer - The player that the current player wants to take a resource card from
        Precondition:
        This method is called by callRobberMethodsByRollingA7() or callRobberMethodsByAKnightCard() after moveRobber(HexLocation, HexLocation) is called. canStealFrom(Player, Player) returns a true statement. currentPlayer and targetPlayer are both valid (not null) and are both part of the current ClientModel.
        Postcondition:
        The currentPlayer takes one resource card that originally belonged to the targetPlayer
